title: Logging onto chat serivce
body: *Well...  I'm not sure if other people are going through this but I do know that a lot of people from last year had this problem... It says "Logging on to chat service" I mean, this was there on the bottom of my screen all day. I thought it was just my internet connection but all the other games are working fine and I  stopped playing league of legends for a day so it can hopefully connect me to chat. I've been looking at a lot of threads but  all the solutions that people came up with (Changing Date&Time and Deleting [summonername].properties.) I really need some help here, I haven't played a game with my friends in a long time since I had to Re-install league since it wasn't opening at all but when I did Re-install, I can open the game but I can't connect to chat. Please help me someone... Someone tell me a solution to fix this. Please don't say "Re-install league."*

replies.body:
Re-install League.

jk

Have you tried resetting your internet options to default, and then setting the security level to medium-low?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1GEWEBpQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-21T01:52:13.198+0000)
>
> Re-install League.
> 
> jk
> 
> Have you tried resetting your internet options to default, and then setting the security level to medium-low?

I have no idea what you're trying to say but I don't think I can. I'm on a Mac AND I don't have administrator so I won't be able to change the network settings.

That's why I was being so generic.

But yeah, if you aren't the admin on your Mac, then get the admin to fix it for you. It's their duty to repair programs that aren't working.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1GEWEBpQ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-21T05:14:28.572+0000)
>
> That's why I was being so generic.
> 
> But yeah, if you aren't the admin on your Mac, then get the admin to fix it for you. It's their duty to repair programs that aren't working.

I can't since this is my school laptop. If i get the admins to fix this I'll probably never be able to use a Mac again

>school laptop

You're lucky your school doesn't have the oversight to monitor your use of the laptop (even though it's in the agreement), because if they found out that you were using it for such purposes, your privilege to use it might be revoked.

Unfortunately this means I will not be able to help you any further. Try playing League on your own computer, that I can help you with.
